description.displayText: Sheronia is a wonderful caregiver for my father. She's extremely punctual, makes sure that he is always showered, dressed, and attends to all of his needs. She also straightens up the house when my father is resting. Most importantly, Sheronia is incredibly kind and compassionate (and tells my mom to go rest when she is reluctant to do so!). We would recommend her without hesitation to anyone looking for a caregiver.
